itunes:title: Handy On An Airplane
title: Handy On An Airplane
itunes:author: Joe Vulpis & Ilya Feddy
itunes:summary:
Smuggling turtles across international borders, getting a handy on a plane, getting a new puppy, address his foot fetish, and the best move you'll ever hear to land a kiss. Joe and Ilya are back this week with the heat, hope you dig it! 

Thank you to Better Help for sponsoring this podcast #ad http://betterhelp.com/bromance
